title: A correlation indicator based on spatial patterns

text: Install development binary version R-universe : Install development source version GitHub :
code: install.packages('cisp',                  repos = c("https://stscl.r-universe.dev",                            "https://cloud.r-project.org"),                  dep = TRUE) if (!requireNamespace("devtools")) {     install.packages("devtools") } devtools::install_github("stscl/cisp",                          build_vignettes = TRUE,                          dep = TRUE)

title: spatial pattern correlation — spc
code: spc(   data,   overlay = "and",   discnum = 3:8,   minsize = 1,   strategy = 2L,   increase_rate = 0.05,   cores = 1 )

title: spatial pattern correlation — spc
text: data data.frame, tibble sf object observation data. overlay (optional) Spatial overlay method. One , , intersection. Default . discnum numeric vector discretized classes columns need discretized. Default discvar use 3:8. minsize (optional) min size discretization group. Default use 1. strategy (optional) Optimal discretization strategy. strategy 1L, choose highest q-statistics determinate optimal spatial data discretization parameters. strategy 2L, optimal discrete parameters spatial data selected combining LOESS model. increase_rate (optional) critical increase rate number discretization. Default 5%. cores (optional) Positive integer (default 1). cores greater 1, use multi-core parallel computing.

title: spatial pattern correlation — spc
text: list. correlation power spatial pattern correlation

title: spatial pattern correlation — spc
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ ## The following code needs to configure the Python environment to run: sim1 = sf::st_as_sf(gdverse::sim,coords = c('lo','la')) g = spc(sim1, discnum = 3:6, cores = 1) g } # }

title: spatial association marginal contributions derived from spatial stratified heterogeneity — ssh_marginalcontri
code: NTDs1 = sf::st_as_sf(gdverse::NTDs, coords = c('X','Y')) g = ssh_marginalcontri(incidence ~ ., data = NTDs1, cores = 1) g #> ***   SSH Marginal Contributions     #>  #> | variable  |     spd     | #> |:---------:|:-----------:| #> | watershed | 0.08591452  | #> | elevation | 0.04576116  | #> | soiltype  | -0.01120835 |
